description: This file defines a singleton object SupabaseConfig that loads Supabase configuration details (URL and key) from a '.env' file stored in app assets, providing a method to retrieve these credentials for other parts of the app.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the '.env' asset file, parses properties, and retrieves the SUPABASE_URL and SUPABASE_KEY, returning them as a Pair.
